titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to apply rate parity to the excise tax on small cigars and small cigarettes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 7/18/2007 S9474-9475)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
7/17/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the excise tax rate on small cigars to $19.50 per thousand (the same rate as for small cigarettes).
